name: SolGuarde
description:
We plan to release the Alpha/Beta at the end of summer on steam!

developed by: Joshua Soran, Calvin Le, William Cameron Perrin

Soulguarde is an online RPG with elements of deception and the ability to betray your comrades. You can chat and plan with your party to defeat the onslaught or turn against them to take all the loot.

Here is the trailer for class we put in before we added the actual model. 

F-dash
WASD-walk
SPACE-jump
B-backpack
C-character
right now only the rightmost character slot works for the weapon you purchased
